DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of KCT-0809 compared to placebo in patients with dry eye syndromes.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of KCT-0809 in Patients With Dry Eye Syndromes
DOC.criteria: Corneal and conjunctival damage Insufficiency of lacrimal secretion or tear film instability Ocular symptom Severe ophthalmic disorder Punctual plugs or surgery for occlusion of the lacrimal puncta
